com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.sensors

Interface SscEventListener


  • public interface SscEventListener
    Used for receiving Snapdragon Sensor events.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onAccuracyChanged(SscManager.SensorFeature type, SscManager.SensorAccuracy accuracy)
      Called when the accuracy of a sensor has changed.
      void onErrorReceived(SscManager.SensorFeature type)
      Called when an there is an error in receiving a Snapdragon Sensor event.
      void onSscEventReceived(SscManager.SensorFeature type, Bundle data)
      Called when a Snapdragon Sensor event has been triggered.

    • Method Detail

      • onSscEventReceived

        void onSscEventReceived(SscManager.SensorFeature type,
                      Bundle data)
        Called when a Snapdragon Sensor event has been triggered.

        See Events for available event types

        Parameters:
        type - the type type to register for.
        data - a Bundle containing the data generated by the event. The following mappings are in the bundle if "type" is set to
        FEATURE_ACTIVITY_RECOGNITION- Name: SscManager.MESSAGE_BUNDLE_ACTIVITY_RECOG_OUTPUT DataType: String
        FEATURE_ABSOLUTE_MOTION_DETECTION -Name: SscManager.MESSAGE_BUNDLE_AMD_OUTPUT DataType: String
        FEATURE_FACING - Name: SscManager.MESSAGE_BUNDLE_FACING_OUTPUT DataType: String
        FEATURE_GESTURES - Name: SscManager.MESSAGE_BUNDLE_GESTURES_OUTPUT DataType: String
        FEATURE_RELATIVE_MOTION_DETECTION - Name: SscManager.MESSAGE_BUNDLE_RMD_OUTPUT DataType: String
        FEATURE_TAP - Name: SscManager.MESSAGE_BUNDLE_TAP_OUTPUT DataType: String
        FEATURE_TILT - Name: SscManager.MESSAGE_BUNDLE_TILT_OUTPUT_X DataType: String
        FEATURE_TILT - Name: SscManager.MESSAGE_BUNDLE_TILT_OUTPUT_Y DataType: String
        FEATURE_TILT - Name: SscManager.MESSAGE_BUNDLE_TILT_OUTPUT_Z DataType: String

      • onAccuracyChanged

        void onAccuracyChanged(SscManager.SensorFeature type,
                     SscManager.SensorAccuracy accuracy)
        Called when the accuracy of a sensor has changed.

        See SscManager for details.

        Parameters:
        type - the Event type registered for.
        accuracy - The new accuracy of this sensor

      • onErrorReceived

        void onErrorReceived(SscManager.SensorFeature type)
        Called when an there is an error in receiving a Snapdragon Sensor event.

        See Events for available event types

        Parameters:
        type - the type feature that reported error.
